name: Codename: Woe
description:
Codename: Woe is a stealth-action I made as my final submission for my time at university. It is inspired by classic stealth games of the late 90s and early 2000s such as Metal Gear Solid, Hitman and Splinter Cell.

The game so far is extremely small, featuring only half a level and the AI is rather rudimentary, though I hope to work on this sometime in the future.

Control Scheme detailed in README.txt
